title: Strictly's Neil Jones 'could miss next week' as Alex Scott gives update
text:
Alex Scott danced with Kevin Clifton on this week’s Strictly (Picture: BBC)

Strictly Come Dancing’s Alex Scott has confessed that she doesn’t know if her parnter Neil Jones will be better in time for next week’s show.

Neil, unfortunately, was forced to pull out of last night’s episode due to suffering an injury, with hopeful Will Bayley also being a no-show due to being left in agony during rehearsals.

As a result, sportswoman Alex was partnered with 2018 champion Kevin Clifton for last night’s performance and she received her highest marks from the judges in the competition so far.

However, Alex isn’t sure whether Neil will be recuperated in time for Saturday as she discussed her routine with Claudia Winkleman on the results show.

‘I think it’s a testament to Neil actually, just the way he teaches me and makes me learn every dance just in case anything happens like that,’ she said of her number.

Neil Jones got injured in training (Picture: BBC)

Addressing Neil at home, Alex said to the camera: ‘Partner, get well.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Alex then returned to tell Claudia that she’s not sure if Neil will be back on his feet on Saturday, adding: ‘We don’t know about next week yet but thank you for the way he’s just making me learn.’

Elsewhere in their interview, Kevin was incredibly modest about stepping up to perform with Alex at the last minute.

‘She got herself there, I played no part in that,’ he said as he talked about their high mark of 34 points for the street routine.

‘I enjoyed that dance enormously, both of them did incredibly well,’ commented Bruno Tonioli later on in the show.

Strictly Come Dancing continues Saturday at ,, on BBC One.

description: Strictly Come Dancing's Alex Scott doesn't know if Neil Jones will be better next week.
